Banner.welcome-to-ida: 歡迎來到國際開發協會
Banner.title: 國際榴槤協會
Banner.description: 國際榴槤協會（IDA）是一個全球非營利組織，致力於促進榴槤產業的永續發展和卓越品質。 IDA 的使命是連接全球生產商、出口商和消費者，創建了一個強大的協作平台，旨在提高產品標準並為所有相關合作夥伴增加價值。

Goal.title: Our goal
Goal.description: At the International Durian Association (IDA) our primary goal is to elevate the global recognition and appreciation of durian through innovative research, sustainable practices, and international collaboration. We aim to be the leading authority in the durian industry, fostering growth and excellence among producers, distributors, and enthusiasts worldwide.

Mission.title: Our mission
Mission.description: Our mission is to support and advance the durian industry by promoting best practices in cultivation, ensuring high standards in quality and safety, and advocating for sustainable and eco-friendl y methods. We strive to create a network of experts, growers, and consumers who are passionate about durian, providing them with the resources, knowledge, and opportunities needed to thrive.

Vision.title: Our vision
Vision.description: Our vision is to become the premier global hub for durian innovation and excellence. We envision a future where durian is celebrated and enjoyed by people from all walks of life, where the industry thrives through sustainable and ethical practices, and where IDA serves as the central platform for education, advocacy, and collaboration in the durian community.

HowWeHelpYou.title: How we help you and the durian industry evolve
HowWeHelpYou.description:
We empower change in individuals and organizations, helping durian
professionals adapt, grow, and lead
HowWeHelpYou.2: Leading the Future of Durian Cultivation
HowWeHelpYou.3: Driving Change in the Durian Industry

Banner2.title: Become a part of a dynamic community dedicated to advancing the durian industry.
Banner2.description: Explore our membership benefits and join today!

SpecializedSupport.title: Specialized support to fit your specific needs

1.title: Generate excitement
1.description: Unleash your passion for durian with IDA's exciting events and activities. Connect, explore, and celebrate the king of fruits with us!

2.title: Grab interest
2.description: IDA provides you with a comprehensive and in-depth perspective on durian, from its origins to modern cultivation techniques.

3.title: Key Achievements
3.description: IDA showcases prominent events and innovative initiatives aimed at enhancing the quality and value of durian in the global market.

Banner3.title: Innovation, excellence, and community - these are the pillars that drive IDA.
Banner3.description: We are committed to enhancing quality and promoting sustainable development in the global durian industry.

Explore.title: Explore our resources, services, and networking opportunities
Explore.description: to collectively advance the durian sector

Footer.description: This site is sponsored by the International Durian Association, the global representative organization for the durian industry, committed to promoting innovation, ensuring quality, and fostering sustainable development. The Association was founded by leading experts and reputable organizations within the durian industry.
